body.name: Magnetic Tiles - Road Set with Car Toys for 3+ Year Old Boys & Girls, Magnet Building Blocks Expansion Pack, STEM Construction Toys for Kids Ages 4-8, Christmas Birthday Gifts for Toddlers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 49 mins
features: 【CREATIVE MAGNETIC TILES】 IGIVI Magnetic Tiles Road Set includes not only traditional magnetic tiles but also cars, school buses, airplanes, ships, traffic lights, and bricks. Kids can place toy cars, small animals, and character figures on the magnetic tile road, creating a city or network of roads for imaginative vehicle driving and exploration. It provides children with more creativity and interactivity, allowing them to experience greater fun and imagination during playtime.

【ALWAYS COMPATIBLE】 IGIVI newly designed magnetic tiles road set is fully compatible and complementary with all leading brands of magnetic tiles on the market. Parents can supplement their kid's existing magnetic tiles set, expanding their collection and providing hours of gaming entertainment.

【STEAM EDUCATION】 IGIVI magnetic tiles road set encourages kids to innovate and build freely, fostering their creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving abilities, preparing them for future learning and career development.

【EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY】 Safety is our top priority. IGIVI magnetic tiles have undergone rigorous testing and certification, complying with federal safety standards and enduring the challenges of daily use. We ensure that children can play and explore safely, creating a secure and enjoyable play world.

【WIDE APPLICATION】 Suitable for homes, schools, and kindergartens, among others, promoting toddler's logical thinking, problem-solving skills, and social abilities. It is a worthwhile investment for kids aged 3+, making it a perfect birthdays Christmas gift for boys & girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 42PCS Beginner Magnetic Tiles 118PCS Magnetic Tiles Construction Toys 54PCS Macaron Magnetic Blocks 54PCS Magnetic Cube Ocean Set Educational Objective STEM Creative Thinking Scientific Thinking Motor Skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought on sale for like 30$ and I don't think it's worth the full $99.99. if I saw this in store I wouldn't pay no more than $15. It says 100pcz but you're only getting like half of that in magnetic tiles. You have alphabet parts that alone is 26pcs, you got some wheels and non-magnetic connecting parts. The magnets feel a little fragile if I'm being honest. It's a REALLY good toy overall I just don't think I want to pay that much for this again. The toy alone I would give 5 stars but the price isn't 5 stars worthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IGIVI Magnetic Tiles
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves playing hours with these Magnetic Tiles. Great quality and colorful. This is a starter set, not the entire set as presented on the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that these have really strong magnets and actually hold. Our little one loves it to, they go together easy and make playtime fun when she can build with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t include everything shown in photo!
reviews.reviewText: I felt like this was misleading because I was expecting to get all the pieces shown…quality was good and my son loved it. I just thought there was going to be more pieces for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need to buy more
reviews.reviewText: I chose this set to introduce magnet tiles toys for my two years old. He likes car figures toys so he easily accepted to play. So far he likes this set very much especially the car tiles. However we need to buy more sets after he knows how to build the roads. There are only 7 tiles of the roads, definitely not enough for a bigger kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not many road pieces
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute set. I was excited to see a set with road pieces. Only problem was that there weren’t many of them. The pictures are deceiving. There are not enough pieces to even make a circular path. Two sets would give me more of the pieces I don’t need and still not have many of the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our six year old grandson couldn’t wait to play with these when he opened his Christmas present. We were impressed with the strength of the magnets and he loved trying to build the suggestions that came in the little booklet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an educational toy. I taught my daughter about traffic lights playing this. Item is as described and good quality.
